---

title: "cache"

description: "Cache related subcommands"

version: "0.4.0"

author: "Clarence Manuel &lt;rencedm112@gmail.com&gt;"

---



## Usage

```bash
omni cache <SUBCOMMAND>
```

---

## Subcommands

- [`dir`](./dir) - Print the cache directory

- [`stats`](./stats) - Show statistics about the cache

- [`prune`](./prune) - Prune the local cache

- [`remote`](./remote) - Remote cache related commands

---

## Examples

```bash
omni cache <SUBCOMMAND>
```

---
